events.message: I received my order last week but I want to return it and get a full refund because the product is not what I expected.
The case has been classified under the 'Refund' cluster due to customer's request for a return and money back.
Support agent Sarah has been assigned to handle the customer's refund request for the recent order.
Hello! I’m Sarah from support. I understand you want to return your recent purchase and get a refund. I’m here to help.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason why you wish to return the product so I can assist you better?
My order number is 123456789. The product is different from what was described on the website, so I’m not satisfied.
Thank you for the information. You can return the item within 14 days for a full refund. I will email you the return shipping label shortly.
Thanks for your quick response and for sending the return label. I appreciate the hassle-free process.
We have successfully processed your return request and issued a refund once the item is received and inspected.
Just checking in to confirm that your refund has been completed and to see if you need any further assistance.
We are closing this case as your refund has been processed successfully. Thank you for contacting support.
